Package bt.net

Interface Peer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InetPeer

    public interface Peer
    Represents a peer, accessible on the Internet.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      InetAddress getInetAddress​()  
      PeerOptions getOptions​()  
      Optional<PeerId> getPeerId​()  
      int getPort​()

    • Method Detail

      • getInetAddress

        InetAddress getInetAddress​()
        Returns:
        Peer Internet address.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isPortUnknown

        boolean isPortUnknown​()
        Returns:
        true, if the peer's listening port is not known yet
        Since:
        1.9
        See Also:
        getPort()

      • getPort

        int getPort​()
        Returns:
        Peer's listening port or InetPeer.UNKNOWN_PORT, if it's not known yet (e.g. when the connection is incoming and the remote side hasn't yet communicated to us its' listening port via extended handshake)
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPeerId

        Optional<PeerId> getPeerId​()
        Returns:
        Optional peer ID
        Since:
        1.0

      • getOptions

        PeerOptions getOptions​()
        Returns:
        Peer options and preferences
        Since:
        1.2
